dt: {bc}a large number of instances in a short period

et: probably borrowed from 17th-century French {it}rache, rasche{/it}, going back to Middle French {it}raiche{/it} "tinea," noun derivative of {it}racher{/it} "to chisel, groove (metal)" (probably also "to scrape, scratch," senses attested in Romance cognates), going back to Vulgar Latin {it}*rāsicāre{/it}, verb derivative from Latin {it}rās-{/it}, participial and nominal stem of {it}rādere{/it} "to scrape, scratch, shave" {ma}{mat|rase|}{/ma}
shortdef: a large number of instances in a short period

dt: {bc}marked by or proceeding from undue haste or lack of deliberation or caution

pt: {sc}adventurous{/sc} {sc}venturesome{/sc} {sc}daring{/sc} {sc}daredevil{/sc} {sc}rash{/sc} {sc}reckless{/sc} {sc}foolhardy{/sc} mean exposing oneself to danger more than required by good sense. {sc}adventurous{/sc} implies a willingness to accept risks but not necessarily imprudence.
{sc}venturesome{/sc} implies a jaunty eagerness for perilous undertakings.
{sc}rash{/sc} suggests imprudence and lack of forethought.
{sc}foolhardy{/sc} suggests a recklessness that is inconsistent with good sense.

pt.t: the {it}foolhardy{/it} sailor ventured into the storm

shortdef: marked by or proceeding from undue haste or lack of deliberation or caution

et: Middle English (northern dialect) {it}rasch{/it} quickly; akin to Old High German {it}rasc{/it} fast

dt: {bc}skin irritation of the diaper-covered area of an infant especially from exposure to feces and urinary ammonia

shortdef: skin irritation of the diaper-covered area of an infant especially from exposure to feces and urinary ammonia

dt: {bc}mild to severe skin abrasion resulting from a fall (as from a bicycle or motorcycle) which usually involves sliding on a hard rough surface

shortdef: mild to severe skin abrasion resulting from a fall (as from a bicycle or motorcycle) which usually involves sliding on a hard rough surface

dt: {bc}sore red spots that sometimes form on the area of a baby's skin that a diaper covers

shortdef: sore red spots that sometimes form on the area of a baby's skin that a diaper covers
